REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0983 reute r f BC-FINAL-TERMS-SET-ON-TO 06-02 0082

TEXT.TITLE: FINAL TERMS SET ON TOKYO ROPE EQUITY WARRANT BOND
TEXT.BODY: The coupon on the 50 mln dlr, five year, equity warrant eurobond for Tokyo Rope Manufacturing Co Ltd has been set at two pct compared with an indicated level of 2-1/8 pct, lead manager Nikko Securities Co (Europe) Ltd said. The exercise price was set at 508 yen per share, representing a premium of 2.63 pct over today's closing price of 495 yen. The foreign exchange rate was set at 146.20 yen to the dollar. REUTER
